Constructor Detail

PlayerTileCollection

public PlayerTileCollection(int[] hand,
                            int[][] locked,
                            int[][] lockedsets,
                            int[] bonus,
                            AvailableTilePattern available)
constructs a single turn tile information object for a player's turn

Parameters:
hand - the player's concealed hand
locked - the face-up tiles as they are known to the players
lockedsets - the face-up set definitions as they are known to the players
bonus - the player's bonus tiles
available - the set of tiles the player believes are still potentially available to it
